news.title: Dutch venue cancels Bob Vylan show over Charlie Kirk comments
news.summary: "I did call him a piece of shit, that much is true, but at no point was his death celebrated," said frontman Bobby Vylan.

news.title: ian announces Dublin show this November
news.summary: The American rapper will play The Academy on November 1, 2025.

news.title: Repak and Hot Press team up for College Roadshow – giving you the chance to win exciting prizes through our waste-sorting challenge
news.summary: You'll find the interactive game at a campus near you over the weeks ahead – as we set off on our College Roadshow...

news.title: Gareth Sheridan gets first Presidential nomination from Kerry County Council
news.summary: In all, four nominations from County Councils are required to get on the ballot sheet for the Presidential election in late October. But today’s result is a clearly a very significant one for the young Irish businessman…

news.title: Former British soldier tried for "unjustified and gratuitous" Bloody Sunday murders
news.summary: "What they did was to falsely claim that the civilians they targeted were armed," said prosecution barrister Louis Mably KC. "The civilians were unarmed and they were simply shot as they ran away."

news.title: Benjamin Steer releases sophomore EP Figuring It Out
Happy Mondays celebrate 35 years of Pills ’n’ Thrills And Bellyaches with Dublin and Belfast shows
news.summary: They will play Vicar Street, Dublin on April 22 and Mandela Hall, Belfast on April 24.

news.title: United Ireland for Palestine: Freedom Flotilla Fundraiser events to take place in 32 counties
news.summary: "Our goal is to raise €32,000 to help fund the costs of the 'Shireen' – a women-crewed Irish Legal Support boat organised by the Freedom Flotilla Coalition Ireland"

news.title: Album Review: Frost Children, Sister
news.summary: Hyperpop duo's latest loaded with floor fillers. 7/10
